title: The Monster and you
creator_credit: Zagreb Film, World Health Organisation, Tadeusz Makarczynski and Boris Kolar
brief_description: Uses animation in presenting a discussion on tuberculosis, pointing out factors contributing to its increase. Urges the use of X-rays and regular medical examinations for early detection and outlines methods of treatment and prevention of tuberculosis.
creator_credit_for_label: Zagreb Film, World Health Organisation, Tadeusz Makarczynski and Boris Kolar
